name: Tailgunner (band)
description: '''Tailgunner''' are an English [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band conceptualised in 2018 and officially formed by January 2022 by bassist Tom Hewson. The band released their debut album, ''Guns for Hire'', in 2023. In addition to Hewson, the current line-up consists of lead vocalist Craig Cairns, guitarists Zach Salvini and Rhea Thompson, and drummer Eddie Mariotti.
